commit message: LWP preparation: Don't use AnimationDrawable: manually display images instead
Draw to a SurfaceView instead of an ImageView
Fix NPE on configuration change

No longer need to draw images on the UI thread.

Correction for animation frame durations
Android code inspection: added ResourcesCompat to get colors with correct apis
Move progress dialog out of AndroidNounours and into MainActivity
Moved the settings rereading from MainActivity to AndroidNounours
Removed the AnimationCache
Add the LWP service.
Separate app and lwp settings

Improve logging of lwp vs app AndroidNounours.

Also try to prevent an IllegalStateException when drawing to the surfaceview
Added an icon for the dimmed setting.
Added flavors
Only include the relevant assets in each apk.

Added a setting to open the wallpaper settings.

Fixed issue about the 'about' preference launching the activity in another app.
Clean up the About screen.
Redraw as soon as the surface view is available
Correction for the default theme id for lwp
Correction for rotation
Theme strings changes
Fix code inspection issues
Change capitalization of app titles. Also ignore lint warning about non-translated strings
The 'portrait' feature is not required
Fix crash in AnimationHandler
Increase version to 2.2.0

Miscenaleous fixes:

* Fix for bug with stuck progress dialog
* Destroy nounours on lwp rotation
* Don't process every single orientation event
* Clear the sound cache when disabling sound
Merge branch 'lwp'
Fix issue where animation names weren't translated
Translate 'wallpaper' into french
Added maping for verison 2.2.0
